name: Human
description: Humans are a diverse and adaptable species, having spread across the temperature moon of Atlah in great number. They are known for having many different types of cultures and beliefs, so much so that they often find themselves quarreling with each other.

options.name: Heart of the Party
options.description: Social interaction is key to thriving in the various cultures of Humanity. Become Good at one Social Skill.

options.name: Action : Human Destiny
options.description: You immediately enter Lifeline but gain 12 Lifeline Points. If combat ends before you die, you gain Health equal to your Level.
